content: उदंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्गतोंऽतो यस्य] Reaching to the end or border of anything. --तः [उद्गतोंऽतो निर्णयो यस्मात्] {@--1@} News, intelligence, report, full tidings, account, history; श्रुत्वा रामः प्रियोदंतं <ls>R. 12. 66</ls>; आत्मोदंत कथयिष्यति <ls>K. 132</ls>; कांतोदंतः सुहृदुपगतः संगमात्किंचिदूनः <ls>Me. 100.</ls> {@--2@} A pure and virtuous man (साधु). {@--3@} Supporting oneself by sacrificing for others (वृत्तियाजनं). {@--4@} One who gets a livelihood by a trade &c. (Wilson).
